reuters.title: ADAMS-RUSSELL <AAR> TO ACQUIRE CABLE SYSTEMS
reuters.body: Adams-Russell Co Inc said it agreed to acquire cable television systems serving about 7,000 customers in New York State from Sammons Communications Inc for undisclosed terms. Adams-Russell said the systems operate in Wellsville, Amity, Andover, Scio, Willing, Belmont, Milo, Jerusalem, Benton and Penn Yan, N.Y. Reuter 
